TopicTitle: BobCat Ind. - Colonization, exploring and research vehicle

Articles.Content:
But you didn't answer the question of whether you would release the sources for KhaosCorp to update / maintain the DEMV line.

I don't really use BobCat mods, but this piqued my curiosity. Aren't his old mods hosted on Kerbal SpacePort? If so, then it seems that the source code would already be available for any of his plugins since the moderators there (and here) absolutely require that the source code be available for any plugin.

Admittedly, depending on the licensing, you wouldn't be able to re-release any of his work, but I don't see why you couldn't maintain it for yourself. Or am I missing something here?

You have a fetish for command pods?

yes I do. Especially ones that have a decent IVA. The Spacetech escape pod for example is one of my absolute favorites BUT it doesn't have an IVA so I made a quick one that puts you inside the actual model. Works wonderfully well!
sounds cool. If any pod, I'd use the One from the Gemini Pack regularly for 1.25M launches
Can anyone tell me why the old HOME modules are so broken and has anyone worked out a fix

Can anyone tell me why the old HOME modules are so broken and has anyone worked out a fix

Some of the issues your seeing are long going issues with HOME...other are new issues created when Squad made the 'animSwitch' line not work anymore...why they did that is past me, as it was a really handy feature to have.

What issues you talking about?

Test orbital ship in telescope mode

90X82 Orbit

Minimus

Old runway

The home RECON module doesnt have the garage open in the VAB, the powerplant wont charge now using the solar panels or the nuclear engine as it says nuclear fuel deprived even though the resource is listed in the cfg, the powerplant module disappears from the VAB after use when looking at the inventory, is there an alternative command to replace the anim switch.

Edited November 24, 2013 by Virtualgenius
I think you use wrong game version.

Test orbital ship in telescope mode

90X82 Orbit

Minimus

Old runway

Mr.BobCat, I just wanted to say, I love the work you do and I can't wait to start colonizing with the new stuff!!!

Nope using the right version someone provided an option to get the solar panels working in one of the bobcat threads, it all worked perfectly under the .21 release the .22 release broke it somehow and I have to say your monitors and models are looking fantastic. The HOME mod was the first mod I got when I started playing KSP so I have a sentimental attachment to it and have been updating it when you put updates out.

Edited November 24, 2013 by Virtualgenius
HOME for version 21.1. You use version 21.1 ?

I have the version which has the HOME 2 stuff in it the new hab modules the one that's on space-port at the moment with 172583 downloads thats how popular youre mods are

Edited November 25, 2013 by Virtualgenius
He meant KSP version 21.1. Unfortunately, in 0.22, Squad broke a feature BobCat was using.

Test orbital ship in telescope mode

90X82 Orbit

Minimus

Old runway

Oh...god. this is awesom...just awesom. Great work!

Test orbital ship in telescope mode

90X82 Orbit

<...>

Now that's KSPorn. Looks awesome.
Is that feature baked into the module or is it part of the cfg file that squad broke

Ok ....

Getting a little confused... After playing around in career for a while I am getting ready to head to Duna and would really like to add HOME to the mix.

From the pics posted I am REALLY looking forward to the inclusion, but from the texts I can't tell if HOME is ready for career... or sandbox 22 for that matter. Spaceport entry still looks tohave 21.1 which I am given to understand is the pre career version.

If am am wrong can someone point me in the right direction?

Alacrity
HOME isn't compatible with career mode, nor with KSP 0.22 for that matter. The new HOME will be.

HOME isn't compatible with career mode, nor with KSP 0.22 for that matter. The new HOME will be.

Ive been using home since 0.22 droped....save for the old recon module and the power module (2 parts I dont use anyway since Gen2) everything works just fine.

And if you want HOME in career mode its very simple to add...its 2 lines in the config for each part.

I will wait for BobCat to drop the new version before folding it in, I still have thing to do in Kerbin System until then

Alacrity

WIP HOME 2 orbital ship

Just for lulz

Parts still like stock size.

Edited December 13, 2013 by BobCat
Looks absolutely awesome Bobcat! Very Soyuz-esque.
So it's like a Soyuz... FROM THE FUTURE! Awesome

He meant KSP version 21.1. Unfortunately, in 0.22, Squad broke a feature BobCat was using.

Generally when that happens, you update things to work with the new version.... or is this something that is just so horribly broken that there's no fixing it ever? I'm really finding that hard to believe.
Bobcat. Those are amazing screenshots. I like what you are doing.
